Lucfreelance

Frontend developer

Hello! I'm Lucfreelance frontend web developer. I'm capable to build modern JavaScript designs for your enterpreneur. Start a conversation (English, Spanish) if you need since a lines of code, until some dedicated digital request on PERNstack or JAMstack. I'd work with frameworks like Astro, Jekyll, Hugo, Eleventy, Bootstrap, and why not, vanilla. I like a lot to made static websites and static blogs; reach me besides for work with databases, testing, integrations… Check over my 2023 websites portfolio / side projects that I'm running. I feel confortable with remote work.

Let's go ⬇️
